summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1630, for the improvement of West 56th Street, in the City of Seattle, from 28th Avenue Northwest to a point 264 feet east of the east line of 24th Avenue Northwest, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 17339 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
